thread.title: NY's W on Lexington - another good experience!
thread.title_full: NY's W on Lexington - another good experience! - Review of W New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: pjcynar
title: NY's W on Lexington - another good experience!
text: This was my third stay at this property -- once for twice; twice for leisure travel. All three times it was very good. The hotel's location is really ideal, and the property is quite nice. The staff is gracious and helpful. There was nothing that I did not like. I highly recommend it and would stay there again.
